scripts.build: npm run proto && tsc && vite build
scripts.//comment: Run python sync and build JS from the temp_protos folder.
scripts.proto: python3 sync_protos.py && mkdir -p src/generated && pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -p src/temp_protos -o src/generated/proto_bundle.js src/temp_protos/*.proto && pbts -o src/generated/proto_bundle.d.ts src/generated/proto_bundle.js
